Careers

Join our team and shape the future of healthcare.

Healthcare Positions

We are a strong team looking for dedicated certified healthcare professionals to join our outpatient care service.

Why is our healthcare service an attractive employer?

Balanced Working Hours

No double shifts, even on weekends.
Focus on employee well-being and a balanced work-life balance.

Optimal Working Conditions

Well-thought-out processes. Healthcare professionals focus exclusively on their care activities.

Attractive Compensation and Benefits

Generous vacation days, holiday pay, and special payments. Option to use company car for private use or job bike program.

Modern Technology

Fully digital work environment with state-of-the-art technology. Paperless documentation and performance records.

Training and Development

Support for individual training and development wishes. We value the well-being of our employees and offer optimal working conditions, fair working hours, attractive compensation, and benefits.

We Offer Training!

Our healthcare service is not only an employer but also a training facility with professional practical instructors for healthcare professions.

Healthcare Professional

(3-Year Program)

Healthcare Assistant

(1-Year Program)

Requirements for Applicants:

  • State-recognized training as a nurse, pediatric nurse, or geriatric nurse
  • Willingness to work in line with our company's values
  • Fulfillment of tasks in accordance with the service concept and company mission
  • Driver's license (Class B)

Schreiben Sie uns eine Nachricht

Bewerbungen können per E-Mail an info@pflege-dorn.de oder ganz einfach über unser Kontaktformular gesendet werden.

Bei Fragen können Sie uns gerne unter 06236/4158945 per Telefon oder Whatsapp erreichen.

Vielen Dank für Ihre Nachricht!

Wir haben Ihre Anfrage erhalten und werden uns in Kürze bei Ihnen melden.
